website_summaries.verdict: This shirt is suitable for men and women. Wearers appreciate the fact that it's a bit more stylish and versatile than some other choices.
pros: The mesh-blend material is designed to keep the wearer cool
Available in highly visible colors with reflective bands
cons: Some wearers felt warm while wearing it in spite of the lighter mesh material

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This shrt definitely exceeded my expectations. Has recently purchased a similar short-sleeve and was fairly disappointed with the size & fit,so i wasnt expecting much.to my surprise the long sleeve fit perfectly, and even stretches so it never feels tight when bending or lifting. Super breathable fabric makes working in them hot summer days a breeze. This shirt has become my first choice
customer_reviews.author: e-z buzz

customer_reviews.title: A very weird fitting shirt.
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman and sadly, there is a limited amount of available high vis and construction clothing in general but I thought I’d try these shirts. The reflective stripes were my motivation, however, when I put it on, the bands around the forearms were tight. Given that these were advertised as men’s shirts, I could forgive that it practically reached my knees in length, but that the forearms were tight makes me wonder just whom it was manufactured for. I’m 5’5”, 115 lbs, so my proportions are small. Weird shirt, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: claymonkey

customer_reviews.title: so looking for something very cool. expected a cooling shirt since it's advertised as ...
customer_reviews.text: the shirt is heavier than i expected. i bought it to wear in summertime South Florida, so looking for something very cool. expected a cooling shirt since it's advertised as moisture wicking. it will be nice to wear in January. probably better weight for other locals. unfortunately, the shirt got a few pulls the first time i wore it, and i'm probably not as tough on my work gear as most people looking for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Davis

customer_reviews.title: Meets safety standards comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Work Shirt To a large extent, the way we think determines who we are and what happens to us. We cannot harbor poisonous thoughts without their effects visibly showing in our lives. If we dwell on our inadequacy and ineffectiveness, for example, circumstances will prove us correct ! because we will invite self-defeating events to us. On the other hand, replacing destructive thoughts with hope-filled, optimistic ones brings peaceful and confidence-producing circumstances to us. We will radiate competence and joy. So as we think... we are That which we focus on... we become ! ;-PB
customer_reviews.author: ; ~ PB

customer_reviews.title: reflective fishbone pattern does not stretch as well as Carhartt but still comfortable
customer_reviews.text: good look and fit. bad location and stitching make the pocket tough to use. the reflective stripping is continuous and restricts movement a bit and actually get pretty hot when under direct sun for extended periods. Carhartt Class 3 shirts have broken stripes so the fabric can stretch and don't tend to heat up in the sun nearly as bad but are over double the price even though they are also made in China. One year later and all shirts purchased are worn out. Back to better quality shirts that fit and last.
customer_reviews.author: Regnad Kcin

customer_reviews.title: Buy
customer_reviews.text: Simply because I hate vests. I feel like they get in my way and make me hot when I work. Too much bulk going on with your clothes then safety vest. This shirt is great for 2 in 1 !!!!
customer_reviews.author: hectorelenocruz

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend these for work!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a couple of these work shirts for my son and he absolutely loves them. He wears them daily at his utility locating job in Phoenix, AZ. They are the perfect weight to withstand the heat in the summer (a great sweat wicking material) and the cool in the winter. The coloring of them has stayed perfectly safety neon yellow through every wash, although the reflective striping has come off steadily from sweating and rubbing on his seat in the work truck. Overall, we are 100 percent pleased with the performance over the last year and will be buying more. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: The pattern looks cool. Size does run large. I am normally large but wear this in a medium. It still has enough room to wear several layers underneath. Has been through a delicate cycle and hang dry once. Held up fine. I wish they made them in kids sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Turd Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: A great solution for when you need long sleeves and hi-vis
customer_reviews.text: This shirt has been really handy due to being on jobs that require long sleeves AND hi-vis clothing. Overall, the fit is pretty on point. I'm a 2XL/3XL (depending on the manufacturer) and took a risk, being 2XL was the largest size I could find. The reflective stripe in the middle is a little snug on my gut when sitting, but otherwise fits well. I will be buying more of these. Oh and these are light and breathable, so good for summer work, not so much winter.
customer_reviews.author: TheGoodRevTom

customer_reviews.title: Get your work gear HERE!
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic shirt that's very breathable and comfortable. No need to wear extra reflective gear it's all built into this quality shirt. There are not many shirts out there that have built-in pockets in this one has that also. I would recommend this hurt anybody
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously long
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small, I'm 5'5" Sleeve and chest/shoulder sizing is good, but the length is ridiculously long. It'd probably fit someone who's 6'. Why would a size small have such a long length? Clothes for construction is supposed to be fitted or relaxed not loong and loose. Don't change the sleeve sizing just shorten the length and the collar a little less loose.
customer_reviews.author: phillip lam

customer_reviews.title: They will not hit me by accident!
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a biking shirt, but I got it for improved visibility when riding my bike... and it certainly delivers. No one will hit me by accident! The shirt is very comfortable, and loose enough to go over whatever else I am wearing. I will probably go to a more breathable shirt for the summer (in Phoenix), but this shirt provided exactly what I was looking for when I bought it. I feel much safer on the streets. Love the tire treads that light up even beyond the shirt visibility!
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: I don’t thinks it’s FR, would be nice to know!
customer_reviews.text: When I was looking for this product I searched FR (fire retardant). I bought the product without really reading the full description, come to find out I don’t think they are FR. I’ve wore them already (against safety rules) so I’m assuming I can’t return them, now they will just sit in my basement until I give them away or throw them away. So for me I think it was a waste of money, but not a bad shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Cash 4 kings

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor working
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered these for himself. He is a tree trimmer and needed more shirts. After he ordered about 4 for himself his coworkers we impressed so he placed a larger order for everyone. They have been washed I definitely recommend hang drying these but they have held up and are easy to clean. So impressed with this purchase and I know that they are going to last.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Arteaga

customer_reviews.title: Excellent on appearance
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable, in the sun/heat or cold. Side vents work great and material is thick but light wieght. If you want to be noticed on a jobsite wear it even under your normal vest. Your appearance is 90% of someone's perception of you and it makes you a A+ to start with on a jobsite.
customer_reviews.author: loren w.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Really good shirt. I ordered this shirt because my safety vest was getting in the way of my tool bags. But this shirt is light weight, very soft and comfortable to wear and I could wear this instead of a safety vest so I work a lot more comfortable without anything getting in the way on my waist tool bags.
customer_reviews.author: SeaJay

customer_reviews.title: The shirt that will survive
customer_reviews.text: So this is the best style of safety shirt on Amazon. The cheaper ones reflective tape starts coming off in a month or 2 and there trash shortly after. This shirt I've had for like 6 months and it still holding up and I'm an ironworker rodbuster
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sizing and cut are weird
customer_reviews.text: If you have an athletic physique this shirt is not for you. I bought the large and it's too tight in the forearms, and too baggy in the abdominal area. Otherwise it's not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Mechelle Marie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered per my husband's request (he doesn't do much online ordering. Lol) and he loved it so much, he had me order two more. He says it's really comfortable. It looks great on him. Flattering fit and great price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Product seems fine, I tried it on but its just too ...
customer_reviews.text: Three days late, probably a carrier issue, and one size too small. Product seems fine, I tried it on but its just too small for me. I'm sure I picked the right size according to the chart, I should've known better. I dislike the neck area as well, it seems wider than needed. Other than these points it seems to be a solid safety shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Boogie

customer_reviews.title: Safe, lightweight, and bright
customer_reviews.text: Great for working in the plants outside. Breathes good and keeps me safe with the bright safety color.
customer_reviews.author: James Holder

customer_reviews.title: Reflective is Kool & Bright @ Night
customer_reviews.text: Would Have Have this T 5Stars but Just done get caught on Anythind or It will ripp
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Product as is advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Great construction vest light weight and cool in the summer time. Keeps you protected and cool with out that crappy vest most contractors make you wear.
customer_reviews.author: paul bynum

customer_reviews.title: Best Safety Shirt on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality heavy material. 3M material is extra reflective and seems durable. Great Fit
customer_reviews.author: Los_81

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: My husband mentions that it's cooler than the other ones he has bought earlier he also likes the fit very comfortable. We will be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Blue isle #3

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and cool.
customer_reviews.text: These are very light weight and perfect for working outside in 100+ weather. A little loose fitting but I personally like that. The reflective strips stay on wash after wash, not like the cheap shirts or vests most employers buy. Own 3 and will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Dweaver

customer_reviews.title: Be seen while being comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and makes it so you are easy to be seen! Lightweight and breaths nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rain Photography

customer_reviews.title: It's a good shirt
customer_reviews.text: Anything with reflective tape don't put in the dryer let them hang on a clothesline
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shirts are light weight and very comfortable for warm weather
customer_reviews.text: Love the tire track shirt the best. It allows your arms to not be restricted. The solid stripes won’t allow you to “flex” your arms much.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Effectively comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Effective work wear, especially if you hate wearing baggy work vests. The material is breathable and light weight. It also has the reflective strips which makes its visibility more effective. I plan to purchase more once I wear the 2 I had originally purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, buy the less expensive brand
customer_reviews.text: Weak material that the threads come up and fray. I bought the $13 ones from a different seller and am much more satisfied with the less expensive brand than this more expensive weaker product. I would not recommend nor buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable heavy construction
customer_reviews.text: I work heavy construction and Earth moving, this shirt has worked out great in the heat and protects me from the sun. Handles washing and I just air dry it. TIP: turn it inside out on cold when you wash it or put it in one if those linen bags to protect the reflectors while washing
customer_reviews.author: Sean N.

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose - Sizing is way off
customer_reviews.text: Shirt meets ansi standards however the sizing is way off. I ordered a small being that I am a 5’4” 120lb female and adult smalls are usually perfect, however this “small” could be considered a large.
customer_reviews.author: flatgrassyplain

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband who is an Electrician. Light weight and comfortable. Would order more but the size I need is no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: itsMeerz1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, I wear this all the time on the job!
customer_reviews.author: Martha J Hastert-Simmonds

customer_reviews.title: The Right Shirt For the Job
customer_reviews.text: I wear this shirt for general landscaping work. It is loose fitting for ease of movement but not baggy. It feels lightweight and cool even on the hottest days. The color is bright and highly visible and has not faded with washing.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs H

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for what its worth
customer_reviews.text: The shirt is comfortable and thinner than most others. The black mesh part isn't as thin as I thought it was going to be, and the arms are a little longer than I was expecting. But in all, it was a good investment as i work in a hot factory environment and this shirt helps, worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The product I bought was your long sleeve high vis shirt I work for a power company and have to wear high vis clothing every day and this shirt is one of my favorites comfortable and good looking every body wants to know where I got it great product guys

customer_reviews.title: This shirt keeps you cool and safer
customer_reviews.text: This shirt keeps you cool and safer. I've only had a chance to wear this shirt a couple of times, but it is nice. I'll be buying a few more for the summer

customer_reviews.title: Great PPE protection

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, very durable in my line of work. The material seems to breathe well in hot conditions, especially for a long sleeve. I’m definitely satisfied with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt for the price! !
customer_reviews.text: I embroidered our company logo on the shirt, which worked well and looks professional!

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for hi-vis apparel.
customer_reviews.text: Well built product, breathable for a long sleeve shirt, the side panels do make a difference. Have noticed dirt comes out easily after washing. Works out good for railroading, meets ANSI 3 standards.

customer_reviews.title: Great summer short.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt for work, it is a very light and breathable shirt. They do run a little large, when I buy more I will go to xl instead of xxl.

customer_reviews.text: I didn't like how tight the high viz was. Uncomfortable. And the high viz washes off after a week.

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband hated wearing his vest over his shirt, said they were uncomfortable and heavy. With this shirt combo it's perfect! Random people asked where he got it.

customer_reviews.text: Great shirt and very breathable but will shrink if your dry them, don't seem to stain easy and I work in the Oil and Gas industry....

customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the fit and the shirt is warm yet also breathes good with the material. Haven’t had any issues with it though haven’t washed it that much either.

customer_reviews.title: Best shirt ever
customer_reviews.text: Work as an electrician and this is THE best work shirt. I live in Colorado and it gets cold. I wear a t-shirt, fleece long johns and this bad boy and I'm good to go all day. Also it's good to wear when "reflecting" on my day

customer_reviews.title: Best Class 3 high vis shirt I've ever owned.

The material is light and breathable even in warmer weather, and it very flexible. the reflective strips don't hinder flexibility like on most high vis shirts... I usually get my work safety gear for free, but the selection is limited and low quality. Even though I had to pay for this myself, I will do it many times over because of the quality of this shirt.

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars Well Deserved

customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is the pocket is small and too loose, anything I put in it hits the ground. Oh and let's see some more colors, not every job requires lime or orange. There is a vivid version of almost every color. Make me one in poppin purple, brilliant blue, livid Lilac, radiant red, glaring green. You get her point. Lol. All in all its a nice product.

customer_reviews.text: I got the shirt 2 XL it was a good thing because the reflective tape going around your stomach would be to tight if I got my size. So if you get this shirt go one size bigger because the tape will not stretch out.
customer_reviews.author: Olen Miller

product_meta.title: KwikSafety (Charlotte, NC) OPERATOR Long Sleeve (w/POCKET and Solid Reflective) Class 3 ANSI High Visibility Safety Shirt Tape Construction Security Hi Vis Clothing Men | Orange Medium
feature_bullets: WHO  A Safe Bet | Hands down the best and most stylish premium personal protective equipment (PPE) work wear gear available on amazon for construction workers, survey crews, surveyors, contractors, emergency responders, EMS, engineer, forestry, firefighter, police, crossing guard, public safety, security, traffic and parking attendants. Or for recreational activities such as: cycling, hunting / hunter, running, volunteering, jogging, bike, bicycle, motorcycle, and volunteering.

WHAT – “More Than a Dime a Dozen” | 100% moisture wicking, water resistant, hi viz neon fluorescent polyester that is quality woven with breathable black mesh on the sides or front. A comfortable neck size and elastic wrist cuffs. Flexible 2 inch fishbone pattern reflector tape for enhanced visibility and mobility night or day and a durable chest pocket large enough to hold an ID, notepad, pens, keys, small tools, and even a small cell phone!

WHEN – “The Best Safety Since Sliced Bread” | This limited edition safety shirt is in full compliance with ANSI/ISEA 107-2015 Class 3/Level 3 for all occupations and available in small, medium, large, extra-large, 2X-Large, Male Female Women Kids Child Youth Safety. Perfect purchase with your hard hat, safety glasses, safety vests, and jackets and great for wear for all seasons! Stretchable collar and loose fit allows less worrying about size and fit!

WHERE – “Hit The Nail On The Head” | Perfect for any construction / work site, warehouse (inside or outside) where ANSI and OSHA compliance is required. Ideal for a company or individual who need safety but want premium PPE product and style.
